ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaMP_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor machine pistol
ThingDef.description: The full-auto pistol manufactured by mechanoid technology can automatically fire small caliber charge shots. It is portable and does not lose firepower. Some mechanitors and relevant important personnel will choose this weapon as their sidearm to defend themselves.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor SMG
ThingDef.description: The submachine gun manufactured by mechanoid technology has a high firing rate and a large capacity magazine, which enables it to generate the general pressing force of machine guns in street battles. It is suitable for targets with insufficient defense.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor assault rifle
ThingDef.description: An assault rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology. Due to the use of mechanoid materials as the basis, its performance has been enhanced compared with the standard charge rifle. It was the standard weapon of some colonies led by mechanitors.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaBR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor battle rifle
ThingDef.description: An battle rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology. It is similar to the assault rifle model, but its advanced capacitor and heavy barrel make it able to project three charged bullets to any position you want at a high firing rate and accuracy in medium-long range. However, because the capacitor will overheat quickly during firing, the firing mode is limited to three-burst at most. \n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor LMG
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun manufactured by mechanoid technology. It is derived from the mechanitor assault rifle. Compared with the original one, it increases the fire rate and range, and its large capacity cartridge drum ensures the continuity of fire power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaDMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor marksman rifle
ThingDef.description: An designated marksman rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology. Through a detailed study of the charged magnetic rail weapon technology, this new type of bullpup rifle reduces its bulk and weight without sacrificing its weapon performance. It is not very powerful, but it has good penetration. It allows soldiers to accurately attack medium and long-range armored targets while maintaining high mobility. It is very suitable for guerrilla warfare.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaHAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor heavy assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A heavy assault rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology. This assault rifle uses a larger caliber charge ammo, which improves lethality and range, but reduces maneuverability.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaSR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: A sniper rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology. Its advanced electronic sight and precision barrel allow it to down the target at a distance.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaGPMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor GPMG
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose machine gun manufactured by mechanoid technology. The upgraded version of the mechanitor light machine gun is more bulky, but its high firepower can effectively block an area, usually used to defend bases.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaSCC_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor special combat carbine
ThingDef.description: An short, large caliber rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology. When used, it is like a shotgun firing slug ammo, but it has a longer range and higher damage ability. By reducing the size of barrel and capacitance, the recoil force of this weapon when firing large caliber ammo is reduced to an acceptable range, but this seriously affects the muzzle velocity and penetration of the projectile. Its special magazine reloads quickly, which can offset the disadvantage of low ammunition load to a certain extent.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaAMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor anti-material rifle
ThingDef.description: An anti-materiel rifle manufactured by mechanoid technology can fire large caliber charge bullets from a long distance to counter armored units. \n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_MechaHMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona mechanitor heavy machine gun
ThingDef.description: An heavy machine gun manufactured by mechanoid technology.It can launch large caliber barrages to suppress enemys. By balancing the weight and firepower, this heavy machine gun is able to be fired by a single soldier, but generally it still needs the user to wear power armor or exoskeleton and other equipment to support its weight.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: WS_InfernoLauncher_Disposable_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona portable inferno launcher
ThingDef.description:
A disposable Incendiary rocket launcher developed by a colony that has long opposed the mechanoids, it can cause considerable damage to groups of people and fortifications.This weapon is obtained by carefully refitting a inferno cannon shell, installing a rocket booster on it and placing it in a simple launcher.
Be careful that it will explode when damaged.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
